TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectManager extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi ObjectManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 在对象进行反序列化时对其进行跟踪。

span.span: Keeps track of objects as they are deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化过程中，将 查询 以确定对序列化流中的对象的引用是否引用已反序列化的对象 (向后引用) ，或尚未反序列化 (正向引用) 的对象。During deserialization, the queries the to determine whether a reference to an object in the serialized stream refers to an object that has already been deserialized (a backward reference), or to an object that has not yet been deserialized (a forward reference). 如果序列化流中的引用是正向引用，则 可以向注册修正 。If the reference in the serialized stream is a forward reference, then the can register a fixup with the . 如果序列化流中的引用是反向引用，则会 立即完成引用。If the reference in the serialized stream is a backward reference, the immediately completes the reference. 修正是指在对象反序列化过程中完成尚未完成的对象引用的过程。Fixup refers to the process of finalizing object references not already completed during the object deserialization process. 反序列化所需的对象后， 将完成引用。After the required object has been deserialized, the will complete the reference. 遵循一组规则，这些规则决定了修正顺序。The follows a set of rules that dictate the fixup order. 如果对象树被反序列化，则实现或具有的所有对象都 可以使用它们传输的所有对象 。All objects that implement or have a can expect to have all the objects that they transmitted through available when the object tree is deserialized. 但是，父对象无法假定其所有子对象都将在完全反序列化时完全完成。However, a parent object cannot presume that all its child objects will be fully completed when it is fully deserialized. 所有子对象都将存在，但并不是所有孙对象都需要存在。All child objects will be present but not all the grandchild objects will necessarily be present. 如果对象需要执行特定的操作，这些操作依赖于其子对象上的代码执行，则它可能会延迟这些操作，实现 接口，并仅在此接口上回调代码时才执行该代码。If an object needs to take certain actions that depend on executing code on its child objects, it can delay these actions, implement the interface, and execute the code only when it is called back on this interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类遍历对象图，只遍历每个对象一次。The following code example shows how to use the class to walk through an object graph, traversing to each object only once. [!code-csharp[ObjectManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/ObjectManager/CS/ObjectManager.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是，则需要提供 `member` 和 `idOfContainingObj` 参数，因为对 `obj` 对象执行修正的方式 。You need to provide the `member` and `idOfContainingObj` parameters if `obj` is a because of the way fixups are performed on objects. 用于存储的信息的空间 是使用其包含对象以内联方式分配的。The space to store the information for a is allocated inline with its containing object. 但是，当 装箱为向注册时 ，它将失去与其包含对象的连接。However, when the is boxed to be registered with the , it loses the connection with its containing object. 为了保证在包含对象中存储的实例中出现修正 ，而不是在装箱实例中出现，会 保留一些附加信息。To guarantee that fixups occur in the instance of the stored in the containing object and not in the boxed instance, the retains some additional information. 保留有关对象及其 ID 的信息。 retains information about both the object and its ID. 在反序列化期间， 可以使用来发现特定对象 ID 是否已反序列化，或者它是否是对尚未反序列化的对象的前向引用。Later during deserialization, can be used to discover whether a particular object ID has already been deserialized, or whether it is a forward reference to an object not yet deserialized.

span.span: The has already been registered for an object other than , or is not a and is not .
